description.@value:
Zoologischer Anzeiger – A Journal of Comparative Zoology is a peer-reviewed scientific journal specialising in the field of comparative zoology. It is included in a number of bibliographic databases: 
* Animal Breeding Abstracts 
* 
* Biological Abstracts 
* BIOSIS 
* CAB Abstracts 
* Cambridge Scientific Abstracts 
* Chemical Abstracts 
* 
* 
* 
* Elsevier BIOBASE / Current Awareness in Biological Sciences 
* Elsevier 
* 
* 
* GEOBASE 
* 
* 
* NISC - 
* 
* Referativnyi Zhurnal 
* 
* Science Citation Index 
* 
* SciSearch 
* Scopus 
* 
* 
* Zoological Record
Zoologischer Anzeiger – A Journal of Comparative Zoology é uma revista científica especializada no campo da zoologia comparada. Está incluída em várias bases de dados bibliográficas.
